1112.content: Where dose the story start?
1112.title: Bart

choices: Bart runs over to a tree made of donuts
Bart runs to the chocolate river
11121.content:
Bart sat on his couch and watched his father, homer, fill up his gut with beer. One day Bart wanted to be just like him, the lazy lifestyle, the relaxation, and the massive gut.

As Bart got into bed the door to his closet swung opened and revealed a land made of various foods and candies. It lure Bart into it knowing Bart’s gluttonous dream.
11121.title: At home.

choices: move on towards the tower of cake
Move towards the dairy fields filled with fattening milk and cheeses
111212.content:
Bart ran towards the chocolate fountain and got down next to it. He noticed the large straw next to him and he used it to scarf down the fattening chocolate. In between sips you could hear a moan escape from his lips as he rubbed his growing belly. everything in this land seemed to be 100x more fattening than in the normal realm.

When Bart drank almost 30 ounces of it he jumped in. His newly formed, yet basketball size, gut jiggled as he landed in the fattening goodness. he swam around in it trying to gulp as much down so he could swell up. Bart could feel his shirt rise up and his bulge grow as he thought about eating everything in this infinite fattening food land.
111212.title: Bart runs to the chocolate river

choices: Timmy continues to eat the tree
He goes to find something else
11411.content:
It was another lame day for Timmy Turner. School was boring, Francis stuffed him into another locker, Trixie ignored him, and his parents forgot to feed him (Yes, they actually forgot to give him food in at least one episode of the show). Timmy stormed up into his room and jumped onto his bed. Then his fairies, Cosmo and Wanda, poofed in to make him feel better.

"Another rough day sport?" Wanda asked the angry boy. "No, it was just peachy!" Timmy said sarcastically. "Oh that's a relief. I thought you were really mad." Cosmo said not understanding Timmy's sarcasm. "I'm just tired of being here, almost no one cares for me except you guys. I wish I was in a completely different world." Timmy said. "You're going to have to be more specific Timmy, like what kind of world?" Wanda asked. Timmy's stomach then started to growl and he said "How about one made of nothing but food?" And with that said, Cosmo and Wanda lifted their wands and they all teleported to a world made completely of food.

Once they were there, Timmy finally had an expression that didn't show anger. He was happy for once this day. "AWESOME!" Timmy shouted as he went to take a bite out of a tree made of chocolate. As soon as he swallowed it though, his stomach immediately bloated up. "This is great! I wonder what other kinds of food there is here!" He exclaimed. Suddenly Cosmo and Wanda's wands started beeping. "Sorry, but we have to go sport. There's an emergency on Fairy World." Wanda told Timmy. "What do you mean?" Timmy asked . "Don't worry too much, this happens every 50 years, though we don't know how long we'll be gone. You want us to poof you home?" Wanda explained. "Are you kidding? There's no way I'm going back, especially right now! Just come back when you're done with whatever it is you guys are doing." Timmy told his fairies. "Are you sure? You already look like you're blowing up like a balloon." Cosmo said as he pointed at Timmy's gut. "I'll be fine, I can just wish it off once you come back." Timmy said as he rubbed his belly. Then Cosmo and Wanda poofed away with looks of concern for Timmy's health. "All right, now that they're gone...
11411.title: Timmy Turner

114111.content:
"I can let loose my sweet tooth!" Timmy munched on the chocolate tree, right down to its roots. Timmy's stomach swelled up more where it started to round out. "Delicious!" Timmy looked around to find more chocolate trees and some bushes. "If the trees are made of chocolate, who knows what the bushes taste like!" Timmy took bites of the trees and the bushes happen to be caramel and nuts mixed in. Timmy ate no more than three trees and four bushes. He laid his head on a half-eaten rock, which happens to made of marshmallow jelly. Timmy's stomach swelled up even more where it started to poke out from under his shirt. "I should've made this wish years ago."

Timmy than heard something, he looks about to see a chocolate waterfall, leaving him astonished, "A waterfall that showers with chocolate! This is even more awesome!" Timmy runs over, his belly sloshing all the way. He douses his hand to fill it and sips it, licking his mouth at the sweet liquid Timmy opens his mouth and moves it under the running chocolate, guzzling gallons down his mouth. Timmy's stomach slowly started to swell up again even more. Timmy retracted himself, letting out a belch and sigh.

Throughout the land, Timmy ate trees, bushes, rocks, and flowers, the latter being it lollipops, all the while the boy's belly grew as he ate.

"Hope whatever Cosmo and Wanda are doing, I hope it lasts long 'cause I'm thinking of staying here for a bit longer..."
114111.title: Timmy continues to eat the tree

1141111.content:
Timmy saw a house made of gingerbread, he thought to himself, if this was here than he might end up meeting the witch who owns the place who will eat him after fattening him up. But, hey, he didn't care since it was made out of sweets. Timmy entered the house and saw everything is made out of candy.

"This house is what I would live in!" Timmy got excited. He started having the chair and table legs, having made out of candy. The bricks of the chimney had jellybeans that Timmy plucked away to stuff in his mouth. The couch is gingerbread, and Timmy ate a quarter of it.

Timmy goes upstairs to see what the bedrooms are like. He finds a door, he heads inside to find a bed next to a nightstand, bookshelf, and a desk. Timmy finds the bookshelf has, well, books. He takes a bite and finds the book is vanilla. He takes another to find it taste like strawberry. "Books as food, now this is an education system I love to learn!" Timmy's belly rumbled, which grew out more from eating. "Weird. I'm hungry?"

Timmy goes back down to the kitchen. He opens the fridge to his eyes beam at cakes, pies, brownies, and cookies, and cartons of soda and chocolate milk. Timmy's belly grumbled loudly, demanding to be fed. He didn't waste no time diving into fridge, already settling into his "temporary" hotel.
1141111.title: Timmy sees a house...

11411111.content:
"Uh... what time is it?" Timmy moaned, rubbing his eyes.

The bedroom was almost half-eaten. Most of the books have been chewed up, the table with small bites on it, and the bed frames have bite marks on it. Empty trays and pie tines are laid on the desk, empty soda bottles littered on the table, and on the bookshelf, and half-eaten sampled pies and cakes next to the bed.

Timmy lost himself in the moment he started eating everything he came into contact with. He lost track of time, he assumed Wanda and Cosmo are looking for him, or their important task is taking much longer than they say it would take for them to return shortly, but Timmy didn't seem to mind or care for that matter.

Timmy's time in the world of sweets has been having an effect on the boy. Timmy took notice that the food was extremely filling, as in fattening, and he started to look like what he did when he wished all the food in his world were desserts. In other words, Timmy is in his overweight state.

Timmy, slim and small, has grown to nearly four times his original size. His face had become noticeably rounder, with his cheeks puffing out slightly and a double chin starting to form around his neck. His arms and upper legs had a thick layer of fat to them, which led up to his very wide waist. His small potbelly has grown into a huge ball of squishy fat. Timmy's shirt is strain as it tried to contain his immense girth. About two inches of his stomach poked out from under it.

Timmy heard a loud creaking noise, followed by the sound of soft yet firm breaking, and before he knew it, his mattress had hit the floor.

"Aw, man... So much for the bed."

As Timmy lifted his very heavy body into a standing position, the floor creaking slightly as he did so, he examined the remains of his bed. Sure enough, it had broken. The bed frame was broken in half with the mattress squished and slightly reformed in a forward position among the wreckage. It was unavoidable anyway, the room was made of candy, which include the bed, so it wouldn't last against Timmy's immense weight.

Timmy shrugged, "I'll just eat the frame and leave the mattress. There's gotta more around here."

The whole house nearly shook with each step that Timmy took down the stairs and into the kitchen. Timmy took out three pies, five cakes, and a soda carton. Sitting in the chair, Timmy ate and ate, while thinking what could take Cosma and Wanda so long with their task. "Cosmo and Wanda have been a long time. Maybe whatever they are doing takes longer. I wonder what they are doing that's an emergency." Putting it out of his mind, he grabbed the bottle of soda to wash down all the food. All that food made his belly grew a bit that it started to bulge a bit more from under his shirt.

Timmy let out a loud belch "I've been in this house for who knows how long. Maybe I can something more edible outside."

Timmy took another bottle of soda and a chocolate. He waddles out of the house to find something that he wanted to look for.
11411111.title: Time has passed...

12432121.content: How will he gain weight?
12432121.title: Ryuji

choices: Akira makes his way into Big Bang Burger
124321211.content: "Damn it all" Ryuji said. A whole week had gone by and he and his friends haven't been able to seek out a new target to have their heart stolen, even worse, no new requests were being made for Mementos as well, so basically its just been a typically normal week, how boring. He hardly got to see anyone anyway since midterms were coming up and everyone was busy studying, so basically, Ryuji was been by myself mostly. Mostly just hanging out at Big Bang Burger, he wasn't taking any of the special challenges but with nothing to do, he would spend his time here enjoying the ambiance and the great food. As Ryuji ordered his third burger for the week he noticed that his belly seemed a tad rounder than usual. "Damn all this sitting around is making me fat." He grabbed his belly noticing that he could know grab it which annoyed him even more. He was a runner dammit! This shouldn't be happening to him. He just groaned as his meal came to his table and began eating it. Hopefully the Phantom Thieves would get a new mission soon so he could burn this fat off.
124321211.title: A Slow Week

124322.title: Mario series?

choices: Eating the food will instantly make him fatter
1331.content:
Ash Ketchum is a young trainer in the world of Pokémon. He was on a journey to become a Pokémon master. One night though, while he was asleep, some mysterious force teleported him to a completely different world. Ash woke up to find himself in a place made entirely of food! "Woah! Where am I?" Ash said to himself. He then realized that there was no one around him. "Wait! Where is everyone?!? Pikachu? Misty? Brock? ANYONE?!?" He shouted to get no answer.

Something grabbed his attention just then. He smelled food, and loads of it, but he didn't see it anywhere. Then he thought of something, he grabbed a bit of the dirt off the ground and smelled it. It wasn't dirt at all, it was chocolate cake? Being curious, he took a bite. It was better than anything he ever had! What he didn't know was that...
1331.title: Ash

choices: He continues eating without noticing how big he's getting
He notices how fat he got and tries to slow down on eating
13313.content:
Every bite that Ash took, would only have him wanting more. Not only that, but his body would also start growing with fat. As he started eating more of the "dirt" he began to get bigger. His stomach was expanding, his butt was inflating, a second chin was showing up, and the rest of him was equally puffing up. Ash wasn't even paying attention to himself because he was too enticed by the food he was eating.

Ash then took a break from eating, feeling very satisfied with himself. "Oh man, that was awesome!" He said as he slapped his gut. "I can't believe this entire place is made of delicious food! But I can't just be eating the ground the whole time, there's gotta be something else." He got up and started walking around.
13313.title: Both

14111.content: How will he gain weight?
14111.title: Harry Potter

141111.content:
Harry moaned in agony as he finished his massive meal. "Why do I do this?" he belched as he felt the roaring pain in his belly. Every single day since the death of Voldemort and the destruction of the Deathly Hallows, he's gorged himself to the point of agony. Breakfast lunch and dinner he'd eaten until he was physically in pain.

Every single day without fail he did this. And he didn't want to stop.

He looked down at his own potbelly which had begun to form due to his gorging. his once lanky frame had begun to fill out from constant and unending gluttony.

He belched once more as he loosened his belt. he should stop wearing pants. It would be easier to just wear a robe and nothing else.

It was then he heard a voice
141111.title: Overeating

1441333.title: How about a Chris?

choices: A giant buffet set up by the runway
A village made entirely of food
14413331.content:
Chris had just finished his latest film and hadn't yet gotten another role lined up so it was time to hit the Bahamas for a much needed vacation. His jet had been in the air for several hours when it hit turbulence. For several seconds, an aurora filled the plane.
"What was that?" Chris demanded.
"I don't know Mr. Evans. It looked like an aurora but it appeared out of nowhere." The captain informed him. "We'll be arriving in the Bahamas in a couple hours."
Chris stumbled back to his seat. The plane was steady enough again but he felt like it was doing barrel rolls. Unnerved, Chris had his stewardess grab him an anti-nausea tablet and a sleeping tablet. He'd barely swallowed them and leaned his back against his headrest before the flight faded to black.

"Sir. Mr. Evans. We've arrived." The stewardess awoke him.
Still groggy, Chris made his way off the plane. The afternoon sun blinded him as he descended the stairs. It made him think what he was seeing was all a mirage.
"Captain, what is this? Where are we?"
"We're in the Bahamas Mr. Evan. Like you wanted."
"Then what is all this?" Chris waved at...
14413331.title: Chris Evans
